name: The Occultist
description:
The Occultist is a game where you run from the unfortunate soul of Allegra Geller as a necromancer with a side scroller view.

Story: As a necromancer you are attempting  to revive the dead body of a demoness which named as Alegra Geller long ago. You have failed during the ritual. Allegra Geller's soul now follows you.
